Original title: August: Osage County
Year: 2013
Duration: 121 min.
Country: United States
Director: John Wells
Screenwriter: Tracy Letts (Play: Tracy Letts)
Music: Gustavo Santaolalla
Photo: Adriano Goldman
Starring: Meryl Streep, Julia Roberts, Ewan McGregor, Chris Cooper, Abigail Breslin, Benedict Cumberbatch, Juliette Lewis, Margo Martindale, Dermot Mulroney, Sam Shepard, Misty Upham, Julianne Nicholson
Production: Jean Doumanian Productions / The Weinstein Company
Genre: Drama. Comedy | Family. Melodrama. drama
Official Website: http://augustosagecountyfilm.com/

Synopsis:
---------
The Weston live in a mansion outside of Pawhuska, Oklahoma. The disappearance of the father in bizarre circumstances makes the family gathers and all its miseries come to light. Film adaptation of the play of the same title, which won the Pulitzer Prize in 2008.

Awards:
-------
2013: Academy Awards: 2 nominations: Best Actress (Streep ) and Supporting Actress. (Roberts)
2013: Golden Globes: 2 nominations: Best Actress (Streep) and Supporting Actress. (Roberts)
2013: BAFTA Awards: Nominated for Best Supporting Actress (Julia Roberts)
2013: Toronto Film Festival (TIFF): Nominated Audience Award (Best Film)
2013: Satellite Awards: 2 nominations, including Best Actress (Meryl Streep)
2013: Writers Guild (WGA): Nominated for Best Adapted Screenplay
